text:
This is reaching the [redacted_name] family in Sampson County, right?
We are trying to reach every household in Sampson County to invite them to Lieutenant Governor Mark Robinson's town hall event tomorrow morning in Clinton!
At the event, Mark will be providing an update on the hurricane recovery efforts he's leading in western NC, discussing his vision for the state, and answering YOUR questions.
This event will begin at 10:30 AM tomorrow (Tuesday) at:
The Gristmill Restaurant
215 Faison Hwy
Clinton, NC 28328
Lt. Governor Mark Robinson is running for Governor of the great state of North Carolina. He looks forward to meeting you tomorrow at 10:30 AM!
Reply STOP to opt out. Paid for and approved by Friends of Mark Robinson. ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸
